subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Shaun Marcum made his season debut, but the ineptitude of the Mets’ bullpen again showed itself to be the team’s most glaring weakness in a loss to the Phillies.
snippet: Shaun Marcum made his season debut, but the ineptitude of the Mets’ bullpen again showed itself to be the team’s most glaring weakness in a loss to the Phillies.
